FormulaTextFORMULADefault: m * x + b
Pre-defined FormulasChoiceFORMULASAvailable Choices: [0] Linear: a + b * x [1] Quadric: a + b * x + c * x^2 [2] Cubic: a + b * x + c * x^2 + d * x^3 [3] Logarithmic: a + b * ln(x) [4] Power: a + b * x^c [5] a + b / x [6] a + b * (1 - exp(-x / c)) [7] a + b * (1 - exp(-(x / c)^2)) Default: 0
(*) optional
